metadata.title: The little caterpillar
metadata.user_prompt: The story of a little worm getting lost and finding its way back home

pages.text: Había una vez un pequeño gusano llamado Timoteo. A Timoteo le encantaba explorar, y un día decidió aventurarse más allá de su hogar en la manzana.

pages.text: Pero pronto Timoteo se perdió. Estaba asustado, pero sabía que tenía que ser valiente. "No voy a dejar que el miedo me detenga", se dijo a sí mismo.

pages.text: Con valentía, Timoteo siguió adelante hasta que finalmente reconoció el camino de vuelta a casa. Cuando llegó, se sintió aliviado y orgulloso. Desde aquel día, Timoteo siempre recordó ser valiente, incluso cuando las cosas se ponían difíciles.

characters.name: Timoteo
characters.physical_description: Timoteo is a small worm, about 2 inches long. He has a soft, segmented body that is a vibrant shade of green. His body tapers at both ends, with the head end slightly wider than the tail. He has two tiny, round black eyes that sparkle with curiosity.
characters.distinctive_features: Timoteo's vibrant green color makes him stand out. His eyes are larger than those of a typical worm, giving him an expressive and endearing look. He also has a small, permanent smile on his face.
characters.personality_traits: Timoteo's large, sparkling eyes and permanent smile reflect his adventurous and brave personality. His posture is always upright and forward-facing, showing his determination and courage.

art_bible.prompt: Create a sample scene illustration in watercolor children's book illustration style for a children's book. The scene should fit a Adventure story for children. This is a reference illustration for a story titled 'The little caterpillar'. The scene should showcase the visual style, colors, lighting, and artistic approach that will be used throughout the book. No text, labels, color swatches, or technical diagrams. Just a beautiful example illustration that demonstrates the artistic direction.
